title: is asking for 2 rp actually a thing?
body:
I just want to open the chests I have no keys for. the keys cost 150 and im sitting at 148 .-. 

can't seem to get keys in games and the 2 increment difference is infuriating, would asking for some assistance be a reasonable request?

replies.body: It could be a thing...I think it's a reasonable request!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), maybe we can work something out!  :D

If you draw a piece of art and ask Porocles or Broporo for help, they might be able to arrange something for you. I don't speak on Riot's behalf nor do I endorse the two aforementioned Rioters in any way but they're both pretty cool senpai so I'd recommend you edit your thread title to include @Porocles or @Broporo and hopefully they'll notice you.
